channel.title: BASIC SCRIPT...WILL NOT TAKE LONG TO MAKE .~ plz help me out :)
channel.description:
:)
i need a script that presses 3 every 10mins....and doesnt stop...gos on and on...and on...
i would also like the thing on the top so if i need to change the number...i can ;)
thanks!

item.title: BASIC SCRIPT...WILL NOT TAKE LONG TO MAKE .~ plz help me out :)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Wait(Minutes * 60 * 60);

or *3600? lol

Actually, it would be 1000 for one second, then times 60 for a minute. 60000.

the ‘right’ script:

[code]const
Key = ‘3’;
Minutes = 10;

begin
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(Key));
Wait(Random(25));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(Key));
Wait(Minutes * 60000);
until False;
end.[/code]
nice try

Oh and do you need ‘3’ pressed every 10 minutes exactly? or before the 10 minutes is up (like runescapes auto log-out).
If you need it before, I would change the minutes to 9.

Read full topic
item.source: BASIC SCRIPT...WILL NOT TAKE LONG TO MAKE .~ plz help me out :)

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

const
Key = ‘3’;
Minutes = 10;

begin
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(Key));
Wait(Random(25));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(Key));
Wait(Minutes * 60 * 60);
until False;
end.
